check_interval_helper: Check for preconditions evey x minutes
max_on_helper: How many minutes to keep the heater on if preconditions preconditions permit
sleep_time_helper: How many minutes to skip heating after having heated for the maximum consecutive heating time
description: Manages Window Heating Element based on various factors to avoid condensation
temperature_inside_shade_helper: If inside temperature rises above this level shading will be activated
temperature_outside_insulation_helper: If outside temperature falls belo this level shading will be activated
temperature_outside_shade_helper: If outside temperature rises above this level shading will be activated
title: Window Heater control
light_low_helper: E.g. for not heating during the night
light_high_helper: E.g. for not heating if the sun is out
temp_diff_low_helper: inside vs outside, positive number means inside is warmer than outside and vice-versa
temp_diff_high_helper: inside vs outside, positive number means inside is warmer than outside and vice-versa
